item.description:
From the MFA website:

Kick off the month in style!
The first Friday of each month, 5:30-9:30 pm

Begin each month in a unique and stylish atmosphere at mfafirstfridays. Join us in the Koch Gallery for fine art, live music, cash bars featuring signature cocktails, and a delicious tapas menu. Relax and unwind in the breathtaking ambience with friends both old and new.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
The November First Friday was spectacular. There were over 500 people and it seemed the age range was mostly in the 40's up to 50+. And for the first time, it seemed that the ratio of women to men was 2:1. If you haven't attended in awhile, check it out in December. We'll meet at 7p which makes better sense for traffic. The party is in full swing by then. Don't miss out . Let's meet at the museum front entrance. Be sure to get an admission pass from your local library for only $7.00 and if you forgot, most $7 passes admit two.

group.name: Boston Baby Boomers Meetup Group-Social Fun

item.name: MFA - First Friday - December 3rd
